recipe.title: Jassy Tasty Wraps
recipe.ingredient: Tasty cheese cut in 1 inch x 2 inch strips
recipe.step: Cut puff pastry sheet into 6th on each piece spread mustard, then place a small amount of ham and top with cheese.
Being two corners together and squeeze so the corners stay together.
Place on a tray lined with paper.
Pop in oven for 15 mins or until golden brown.
